title: A True Fill Position
body:
I just curious if League will actually make the preset roles of top, mid, bot, support, and jungle with a true fill position.
It is infuriating to know that fill is basically another way of saying I want support.
I absolutely love support, but it sucks to know that fill will only get me that position majority of the time.
So I suggest actually making 20% to get any role and be more fun because I truly like randomization.
And if there is not many people play support, you still have the automatic drafting people into support.

replies.body: Also, it's more a function of there not being enough Support players compared to other roles. Fill doesn't mean random, fill means you're going to fill in a role where needed, and it just so happens that support is more often needed than anything else. They've been working on some things to make support a more attractive role, but thus far nothing major has been done. New support item changes seem fun though.
They tried offering a position-veto fill (basically "anything but x") on some servers early this season, and it led to significantly longer queue times and support shortages. So they scrapped it.
